name: Logic Colors
description:
Logic Colors is Indie Logic Game in which You move color tiles to solve riddles. Discover rules and relax in 225 unique levels and unlock all objects in game! Will You finish them perfectly?

3 Categories of Levels:
  • 75 Levels with constants (easy)
  • 75 Levels with constants and clones (medium)
  • 75 levels with clones (hard)

225 LEVELS TOTAL

ITEMS TO UNLOCK IN GAME
